doc: Transform your long URLs into concise, shareable links. Our modern URL shortener makes it easy to create and manage shortened URLs for your needs.
toast_invalid_url_description: Please enter a valid URL including http:// or https://
error_description: An error occurred while shortening your URL. Please try again.
clipboard_error: Clipboard access not available in your browser.
success_description: Your URL has been shortened successfully.
success_copy: The shortened URL has been copied to your clipboard.
copy_error: Failed to copy URL to clipboard.
card-description: Enter a long URL below to create a shortened version.
